name: davidplans.github.io
tagline: Product architect for health and wellbeing technology
body:
### About me.
Started life as a musician, then studied artificial intelligence and computer science. After running and eventually merging an Open Source startup, I built [BioBeats](http://biobeats.com), a startup that focuses on technologies that help people be well. I run it with Davide Morelli (@morellid) and Nadeem Kassam (Basis founder).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
